case_title: United States of America v. Sivigliano
case_info_full_case_name: United States of America v. Sivigliano

charges.charge_disposition: Dft sentenced to custody of Bureau of Prisons for a term of 96 months; Supervised Release 3 years; Dft ordered to pay restitution in the amount of $2,214,577.25 joint and several with co-dfts; S/A fee $4,600.00 due immediately
